title: Blurry client after update
body:
!!Not sure if this works for everyone but it worked for me
Thanks Àvenger!!



> [{quoted}](name=Àvenger,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=A4H60K8F,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2018-11-25T21:51:11.690+0000)
>
> If you have a Nvidia graphics card, try going into the Nvidia control panel -> Manage 3D settings -> Program Settings Tab -> Select the League of Legends client ( If it's not in the drop down tab you'll have to add it). -> Disable "Antialiasing - FXAA" -> Select Apply
> 
> This fixed the blurry issue for me, hope it helps.

This started happening after my client updated today.

Only the client is blurry and it doesn't seem to go away however in game is fine.
I've tried reinstalling, repairing, changing settings with the leauge exe. updating my graphics driver nothings helped.

~~Anyone has a fix? ~~

replies.body:
If you have a Nvidia graphics card, try going into the Nvidia control panel -> Manage 3D settings -> Program Settings Tab -> Select the League of Legends client ( If it's not in the drop down tab you'll have to add it). -> Disable "Antialiasing - FXAA" -> Select Apply

This fixed the blurry issue for me, hope it helps.
I'm in love with you my guy

Ty very much this was the solution to my problem. To other ppl who have the same problem try this out and restart the LOL client otherwise it will not work. This ofc only works if u have an Nvidia Card
You da real MVP, worked just fine for me too, thanks a bunch man!

HOW TO FIX: (PLEASE UPVOTE IF THIS WORKS FOR YOU SO OTHERS CAN SEE IT!!)
**VERIFIED W/ NVIDIA GPU ONLY**
1. Navigate to the Nvidia Control Panel > Manage 3D Settings
2. Program Settings Tab > "Add" button > "Browse" button
3. Navigate to "[drive path]\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.177\deploy"
4. You will see 3 league executable files, "LeagueClient", "LeagueClientUx", and "LeagueClientUxRender"... Select any one of them
5. Now that you have selected a program file, set "Altialiasing - FXAA" to OFF ... "Texture filtering - Anistropic sample optimization " to OFF... "Texture filtering - Quality" to HIGH QUALITY... "Texture filtering - Trilinear optimization" to OFF
6. Find the other 2 applications that you did not select in step 3, repeat steps 4 and 5 for each one.
7. If your client is currently running, blurriness will not go away until you close and re-launch the client.
Fixed mine! Thanks a lot!
LIFE SAVER

I have the exact same problem, is horrible.
I never had it, it started after last update

Hi Everyone, we started tracking this error after it was raised in the [bug megathread](https://old.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/9yqqeb/patch_823_bugs_megathread/) a few times. As of now we're having trouble reproducing the issue in order to solve so we'd appreciate if you could [send in a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for our Player Support team to better track the issue.

Some players who wrote in were able to resolve the issue for now by [enabling low spec mode in the client](https://imgur.com/a/VmzE7gk).

I've sent in a ticket hopefully a fix will be found.
Thanks.

--disable-gpu –enable-use-zoom-for-dsf

Put this into your "target" section for your League shortcut, it works half of the time. Put it after the "

It should look like this:

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe" --disable-gpu –enable-use-zoom-for-dsf

Haven't found a perm solution though, this also fixed it for a bunch of other apps including Visual Studio Code.

Same problem here. Already tried to fix it in several ways. But nothing helps unfortunately. Even starting it in "high DPI" mode does not help. Even tried to start it with different settings, still nothing. It's either a Client bug or an issues with my (our) Display settings. Maybe try looking through your nVidia or Radeon system settings.{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
still having the same issue and none of the solutions for other people worked on my client.

having the same problem, and neither the FXAA disable solution nor the low spec enabled resolved it entirely, it is less blurry when only fxaa is disabled, turning on low spec mode makes it even worse

my gpu is a 1080 ti
did u restart the client after u did the changes ??

~~That FXXA does not working on mine unfortunatelly.~~ However, i have found people were saying about "Compatibility Mode". that works, however not so perfectly. It slows down the anima progress like your rank display in profile or when you row down chanpain list. I am running in xp mode. There is a video in youtube on how to run Compatibility Mode[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z927IMIJ5KM)
hope this works for the rest of u <3
PS: I found a trick. the lol with client is actually the game, the one with just lol is the client. omgelul

Same thing is happening to me, 165hz monitor in game its fine, I set to windows xp compatibility to fix it.
When I done this though I started to get audio and mouse / video stutter loading into the game (Post champ select) but it fixed the menus atleast XD
same for me...
run the client in windows xp compatibility mode, that worked for me
same problem here... only after the update so guessing its client side
Same
I have the same issue as well.
I have the same issue. The client gets blurry once I click on the profile tab.
I'm having this issue as well! Windows 10, Intel, gtx 1080 are my specs!! =/
Restart it and if it's still the same run it as administrator. That's what worked for me.
Does not work unfortunately.

Could be a bad overlay interaction? If you have anything like discord overlays, shadowplay, basically anything that might pull focus away from the client, try disabling it. Past that I wouldn't know where to start, so I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
I don't have discord or any of those programs running whilst playing league. Also not sure where to start but maybe will send in a ticket it isn't pleasent on the eyes.

Previous solution: but it only helps for the menu, I still can't read the after game lobby stuff at all

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/HBrylrdR-league-of-legends-and-windows-10-how-to-fix-blurry-or-fuzzy-screens
I've tried that but it didn't fix it unfortunately.

I have the same problem, but it only appears when I click on "Profile", I've tried disabling DPI scaling, updating drivers, running it in safe mode and running it as admin, nothing seems to be working.

i have the exact same problem! its annoying, but i can play!

Hope it wil me fixed soon
It only happens when you queue up, it doesn't happen to me when I log in normally but when I queue up everything gets blurry
Hello, I'm from EUWE and happens to me also. Solutions in the comments didn't help at all. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I also have the exact same problem, and also the moment i hover the blurry-area the blur is gone, the moment my mouse moves away from the area it happens again.
